actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: To provide that any individual who is the spouse of a Member of Congress shall be ineligible for any civilian office or position as to which appointment is required to be made by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Prohibits any spouse of a Member of Congress from being eligible for any office or position for which appointment is required to be made by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate.

titles.title: To provide that any individual who is the spouse of a Member of Congress shall be ineligible for any civilian office or position as to which appointment is required to be made by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate.
